featureSchema.name: Analytics and Insights
featureSchema.description: Offers users insights into their productivity by tracking completed tasks, setting goals, and visualizing performance trends over time.
featureSchema.userStory: As a user, I want to see my productivity metrics and set personal goals so that I can monitor my progress and improve efficiency.
featureSchema.acceptanceCriteria: The system should provide charts and statistics on task completion trends, and allow users to set and review progress on productivity goals.
featureSchema.additional: Integrate data visualization tools and provide options for exporting reports.
featureSchema.prompt: Build an analytics dashboard that tracks task completion, productivity trends, and personal goal achievements. Ensure the data is presented in an easily digestible format with visual charts.
featureSchema.notes: Focus on clear data representation and user-friendly interfaces for insights.
